title: Worth The Wait
description: This is a sweet romantic suspense and a prequel to A Merchant Street Mystery series. It occurs fifteen years before the series begins and the story will continue in the full-length novels. In other words, TO BE CONTINUED or a TEASER. This short read is suitable for young adults and up. Storyline: Dependable Adele Abberley is tired of seeing to everyone else's responsibilities, including running the family antique store, taking care of her dad, and tending her brother's two boys. When idealistic Kipp Waterbury drops by her antique store, will his romantic nature help her to view the world in a brand new light? Will the secrets they find hidden in an antique Victorian chair encourage her to stop trying to please everyone and please herself instead?
author: Cindy A. Christiansen
